p: Among COVID-19 proposed drugs already approved for other pathologies, GR 127935, a known potent entry inhibitor of Ebola and Marburg viruses, binds the SARS-CoV-2 receptor ACE2 and also is a selective 5-HT1B/1D receptor antagonist, making it useful in patients with hypotension and tachyarrhythmia, when administration of vasopressors is questionable.
